description: This file defines the HomeShell widget, a stateful Flutter widget that serves as the main navigation shell for an app. It manages a bottom navigation bar with tabs for Menu, Cart, and Orders, and includes UI animations and badge indicators.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: Main widget providing a bottom navigation layout for the app, with three tabs: Menu, Cart, Orders.

classes.name: _HomeShellState
classes.description: State class managing the current tab index, page list, and UI animations for HomeShell.

classes.name: _GoldBadge
classes.description: A custom widget displaying a shopping cart icon with a badge indicating item count, with animation effects.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the HomeShell widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeShell, including AppBar, body with animated pages, and bottom navigation bar.

methods.name: _GoldBadge.build
methods.description: Builds the badge widget with icon and item count, including animations and positioning.
